lines: !throw The 🏃‍♂️ Speedrunner is immune to 💫 Stun!
!throw The 😈 Overlord Demon of the Dungeon is immune to 💫 Stun!
!if {!is {me} ballet_prediction} = True and {!is {me} monster_se_{2}} = False and {2} = ID6
!say The {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} params emoji} {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} title} has gained **{!data status_effect {2} params emoji} {!data status_effect {2} title} {amt}**!
